response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,

I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique and valuable product that holds immense worth for me. This item is not just an object; it represents a significant milestone in my journey and has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and excellence.

I am offering you the chance to own this product at a special introductory price of $950,000. This offer is exclusive to you and reflects my confidence in its value and potential for you. I believe that with your discerning taste and appreciation for exceptional items, this product will not only serve as a valuable asset but also become a cherished possession.

Please consider this offer carefully, and let me know if you have any questions or require further information about the product. I am more than happy to provide additional details to help you make an informed decision.

Thank you for considering this opportunity. I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 950000}
